title: The Woods - Three-part video installation
brief_description: The Woods is a video installation comprising of three documentaries on child film stars from the United States of America, Nigeria and India. ‘The Audition’ features Hollywood stars; ‘The Interview’ features Nollywood stars and ‘The Rehearsal’ features Bollywood stars. The Woods was exhibited at ACMI as part of The Character exhibition in 2015.
